messages.message: Good morning! What can I do for you today?
Hello doctor. I haven't been feeling well for three days. I have a sore throat and a stuffy nose.
Do you also have a fever?
Yes, last night I had a fever of 38.5 degrees. This morning it was a bit lower, around 37.8 degrees.
Do you also have a cough?
Yes, a little bit. It's a dry cough that gets worse especially at night.
Do you have a headache or body aches?
Yes, my whole body hurts, especially my head and muscles.
Do you have a cold or a runny nose?
Yes, my nose is running constantly and I have to sneeze often.
Alright. That sounds lke a viral upper respiratory infection. I will prescribe you a painkiller and recommend plenty of rest and enough fluids.
